Question.Subject: How to return fake phone?
Question.Content: I ordered the nokia n95 phone online which turned out to be its famous fake version. How do I return it to the sender and get back credit without them claiming I did a bait and switch?
Question.ChosenAnswer: hey if u got it from ebay,amazon or any like these sites your gone u cant do anything Now so leave it but othere sites u can see if they have provides any contact info so contact them but other wise ur done you cant do anything.

Answer.Content: hey if u got it from ebay,amazon or any like these sites your gone u cant do anything Now so leave it but othere sites u can see if they have provides any contact info so contact them but other wise ur done you cant do anything.
